00030 void Session::listen(CUrl url) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00031 {
00032     checkStarted();
00033     bool isQueue = false;
00034     Property* p = lockAndGetProperty(url);
00035         p->listeningSessions.insert(this);
00036         isQueue = p->isQueue();
00037     unlockProperty(p);
00038     if (isQueue) listenToQueue(url);
00039 }
00040 
00041 void Session::unlisten(CUrl url) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00042 {
00043     checkStarted();
00044     bool isQueue = false;
00045     Property* p = lockAndGetProperty(url);
00046         p->listeningSessions.erase(this);
00047         isQueue = p->isQueue();
00048     unlockProperty(p);
00049     if (isQueue) unlistenToQueue(url);
00050 }
00051 
00052 void Session::listenToTreeChanges(cstr prefix) throw (InvalidOperation)
00053 {
00054     checkStarted();
00055     repository->sessionsListeningToTreeMutex.lock(HERE);
00056 /*      RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Adding '%s' '%s'", prefix.c_str(), sessionName.c_str());*/
00057         repository->sessionsListeningToTree.insert(make_pair(prefix, this));
00058     repository->sessionsListeningToTreeMutex.unlock();
00059 }

00067 void Session::listenToTimer(double ms) throw (InvalidOperation)
00068 {
00069     repository->sessionsListeningToTimerMutex.lock(HERE);
00070         repository->sessionsListeningToTimer[this].interval = ms;
00071         repository->sessionsListeningToTimer[this].timer.start();
00072     repository->sessionsListeningToTimerMutex.unlock();
00073 }

00088 void Session::wait() throw()
00089 {
00090     bool isEnabled = true;
00091     do {
00092         sessionSemaphore.wait();
00093 
00094         isEnabled = true;
00095         try { isEnabled = getBool("enabled"); } catch (...) { } // FIXME "enabled"
00096         
00097         if (exiting) isEnabled = true;
00098         isEnabled = true;   // FIXME    
00099         if (!isEnabled) {
00100             // empty the event queue
00101             currentEvents = consumerEventQueue->freeze();
00102             RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Emptying events queue of session '%s' because module is disabled", sessionName.c_str());
00103             // empty all subscripted queues
00104             for (map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator it = queueSubscriptions.begin();
00105             it != queueSubscriptions.end(); ++it) {
00106                 RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Emptying queue '%s:%s' because module is disabled", sessionName.c_str(), it->first.c_str());
00107                 it->second.consumerQueue->freeze();
00108             }
00109             
00110             // empty all subscripted diff queues
00111             for (map<Url, QueueSubscription>::iterator it = diffsSubscriptions.begin();
00112             it != diffsSubscriptions.end(); ++it) {
00113                 RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Emptying diff queue of '%s:%s' because module is disabled", sessionName.c_str(), it->first.c_str());
00114                 it->second.consumerQueue->freeze();
00115             }
00116                 
00117             // FIXME nella sottoscrizione il modulo pu� indicare che non vuole che la coda venga
00118             // svuotata in questo caso
00119             // FIXME fare tanti wait per evitare di essere svegliati inutilmente
00120         }
00121     } while (!isEnabled);
00122 
00123     currentEvents = consumerEventQueue->freeze();
00124 
00125     if (currentEvents.size() > 0) {
00126         for (size_t i = 0; i < currentEvents.size()-1; i++) sessionSemaphore.wait();
00127     }
00128 }
00129 
00130 void Session::dontWait() throw ()
00131 {
00132     // FIXME manage "enabled" stuff
00133     currentEvents = consumerEventQueue->freeze();
00134     if (currentEvents.size() > 0) {
00135         for (size_t i = 0; i < currentEvents.size()-1; i++) sessionSemaphore.wait();
00136     }
00137 }
00138 
00139 void Session::pushEvent(Event* event) throw ()
00140 {
00141     eventQueue->push(event, HERE);
00142     eventQueue->gc(HERE);
00143     wakeUp();
00144 }
00145 
00146 vector<const Event*> Session::events() throw (InvalidOperation)
00147 {
00148     checkStarted();
00149     return currentEvents;
00150 }
00151 
00152 bool Session::wokenByEvent(cstr eventName) throw (InvalidOperation)
00153 {
00154     checkStarted();
00155     for (size_t i = 0; i < currentEvents.size(); i++) {
00156         if (currentEvents[i]->type == eventName) return true;
00157     }
00158     return false;
00159 }
00160 
00161 void Session::wakeUp(int times) throw ()
00162 {
00163     for (int i = 0; i < times; i++) {
00164         sessionSemaphore.signal();
00165     }
00166 }
